lines.text:
[talking to Susan Bradley]
I sent my picture into one of those Lonely Hearts Clubs and they sent it back, saying "We're NOT that lonely!"
Marty Peters? The man who shot the last blacksmith?
[Chris has just been made the new blacksmith]
Well, it's all based on circumstantial evidence. No one actually saw the bullet leave the gun.
Where do ya come from, Tex?

[singing]
Yeah, they say they have hair on their chest, the only thing I've seen is just a fancy vest. Holy smackers, milk and crackers but it's wild in the wild, wild west.
Would it be possible you don't want to marry me?
Now wait a minute Ms. Bradley. I wanna marry ya, I wanna marry ya somethin' like all get-out. I wanna marry ya somethin' awful ma'amm. But please ma'am, please say no.
